description: Comprehensive introductory algebra course covering foundational skills, equations, functions, graphing, linear systems, polynomials, quadratics, radicals, and basic statistics. Designed to prepare students for Algebra 2 and standardized math assessments.

topics.name: Unit 1: Foundations of Algebra
topics.description: Variables, expressions, order of operations, real numbers, properties of equality, and evaluating algebraic expressions

topics.name: Unit 2: Solving One-Variable Equations
topics.description: One-step, two-step, and multi-step equations, inverse operations, rational coefficients, and solving equations with variables on both sides

topics.name: Unit 3: Introduction to Functions and Relations
topics.description: Relations vs functions, domain and range, function notation, and evaluating functions

topics.name: Unit 4: Graphing Linear Equations
topics.description: Coordinate plane, slope, slope-intercept form, graphing from equations and tables, and identifying linear patterns

topics.name: Unit 5: Writing Linear Equations
topics.description: Slope-intercept form, point-slope form, standard form, writing equations from graphs, tables, and real-world situations

topics.name: Unit 6: Linear Inequalities in One Variable
topics.description: Solving inequalities, graphing solutions on a number line, compound inequalities, and absolute value inequalities

topics.name: Unit 7: Systems of Linear Equations
topics.description: Solving systems by graphing, substitution, elimination, special cases, and applications

topics.name: Unit 8: Systems of Linear Inequalities
topics.description: Graphing linear inequality systems, identifying feasible regions, and modeling constraints

topics.name: Unit 9: Exponents and Exponential Functions
topics.description: Exponent rules, scientific notation, exponential growth and decay models, and evaluating exponential functions

topics.name: Unit 10: Polynomials
topics.description: Adding, subtracting, and multiplying polynomials, degree, leading coefficient, and polynomial structure

topics.name: Unit 11: Factoring Polynomials
topics.description: GCF factoring, factoring trinomials, difference of squares, perfect square trinomials, and solving by factoring

topics.name: Unit 12: Quadratic Functions
topics.description: Graphing quadratics, vertex form, standard form, symmetry, transformations, and solving quadratic equations

topics.name: Unit 13: Radicals and Irrational Numbers
topics.description: Simplifying radicals, rationalizing denominators, operations with radical expressions, and real-number classification

topics.name: Unit 14: Data Analysis and Statistics
topics.description: Measures of central tendency, variability, box plots, scatter plots, trendlines, and correlation

topics.name: Unit 15: End-of-Year Review and Capstone
topics.description: Comprehensive review of algebraic concepts, cumulative problem-solving, real-world applications, and exam preparation
